description: Boral is the largest integrated construction materials company in Australia, with a leading position underpinned by strategically located quarry reserves and an extensive network of operating sites. We also manufacture and supply a range of building products. Boral Concrete has over 230 pre-mix concrete plants around Australia producing a wide range of concrete mixes in metropolitan and country areas. Boral Concrete supplies pre-mix concrete to all segments of the construction industry including infrastructure, social, commercial and residential construction. For this EPD, Boral has chosen a range of pre-mix concrete products including its ENVISIAÂ®, lower carbon high performance concrete, EnvirocreteÂ® Plus and EnvirocreteÂ® alongside more conventional mixes such as normal class and road authority compliant mixes.

Boral Concrete supplies pre-mix concrete to all segments of the construction industry including infrastructure, social, commercial and residential construction. For this EPD, Boral has chosen a range of pre-mix concrete products including its ENVISIAÂ®, lower carbon high performance concrete, EnvirocreteÂ® Plus and EnvirocreteÂ® alongside more conventional mixes such as normal class and road authority compliant mixes.
name: Boral Pre-mix Concrete - ENVIROCRETE PLUS 50MPa

description: Boral is the largest integrated construction materials company in Australia, with a leading position underpinned by strategically located quarry reserves and an extensive network of operating sites. We also manufacture and supply a range of building products. Boral Concrete has over 230 pre-mix concrete plants around Australia producing a wide range of concrete mixes in metropolitan and country areas. Boral Concrete supplies pre-mix concrete to all segments of the construction industry including infrastructure, social, commercial and residential construction. For this EPD, Boral has chosen a range of pre-mix concrete products including its ENVISIAÂ®, lower carbon high performance concrete, EnvirocreteÂ® Plus and EnvirocreteÂ® alongside more conventional mixes such as normal class and road authority compliant mixes.
name: Boral Pre-mix Concrete - ENVISIA 80MPa
